body: $1.py
Run python in terminal.description: Create terminal output with run button for python script

body: <pre><code>(ecpc) > ${1:command} <button type="button" name="$1_${3:suffix}" onclick="runScript('$1_$3')">{{ enter }}</button><button type="button" name="$1_$3" onclick="runScript('$1_$3')" class="invisible">{{ reload }}</button>
